alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Jackson; Jones (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 4:53PM CDT until July 14 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR JACKSON...SOUTHEASTERN JONES AND WESTERN CLINTON COUNTIES... At 452 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Washington Mills to near Onslow, and are nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Maquoketa, DeWitt, Preston, Delmar, Wyoming, Oxford Junction, Lost Nation, Miles, Andrew, Charlotte, Onslow, Welton, Monmouth, Springbrook, Zwingle, Spragueville, Fulton, Hurstville, Green Island and Nashville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
